p: Wolfram Mathematica Â® 10 (Wolfram Research, Inc., Champaign, Illinois) software was used to perform linear algebra calculations, sensitivity and elasticity analysis, and Monte Carlo simulations. Logistic regression analysis was conducted using the logit link function and Stata statistical software (StatCorp, College Station, Texas). ArcMap 10.3 (ESRI, Redlands, CA) software was used for climate data extraction, raster algebra, and map creation. A data and code package is available in a GitHub repository ( https://github.com/mark-a-hayes/Hayes-Adams-2017).
